data.title: Chris George Koch
data.meta_description: Chris George Koch was appointed in 2017 as Branch Manager: Kathu in South Africa’s Northern Cape. Chris is a Qualified Process Engineer (HND Ext Met) with over 30 years’ experience directly and indirectly in the mining industry.
data.text:
Chris Koch was appointed in 2017 as Branch Manager: Kathu in South Africa’s Northern Cape.

Chris is a Qualified Process Engineer (HND Ext Met) with over 30 years’ experience directly and indirectly in the mining industry. Over this time Chris gained extensive metallurgical experience and knowledge in Production, Technical, Projects, Sales, Process Control and Field Services.

He describes himself as a creative out-of-the-box thinker, not always orthodox in his approach but getting things done by smarter, innovative and technological thinking.

“One has to be dynamic in an ever-changing world.”

Business Philosophy: If you do today what you did yesterday, you will have tomorrow what you have today.
